UV Package Installation methods Install uv with our standalone installers or your package manager of choice. Use curl to download the script and execute it with sh:
BASHCollapseCopycurl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | shClick to expand and view moreIf your system doesn’t have curl, you can use wget:
BASHCollapseCopywget -qO- https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | shClick to expand and view moreRequest a specific version by including it in the URL:
BASHCollapseCopycurl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/0.9.4/install.sh | shClick to expand and view more

Vs Studio installation Install VS Studio Code
BASHCollapseCopysudo apt update Option 1 sudo apt-get install wget gpg wget -qO- https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc | gpg --dearmor > packages.microsoft.gpg sudo install -D -o root -g root -m 644 packages.microsoft.gpg /etc/apt/keyrings/packages.microsoft.gpg echo "deb [arch=amd64,arm64,armhf signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/packages.microsoft.gpg] https://packages.microsoft.com/repos/code stable main" |sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/vscode.list > /dev/null rm -f packages.microsoft.gpg sudo apt update sudo apt install codeClick to expand and view more

Python Manage Extremely fast Python package and project manager, written in Rust.
Highlight ğŸš€ A single tool to replace pip, pip-tools, pipx, poetry, pyenv, twine, virtualenv, and more. âš¡ï¸ 10-100x faster than pip. ğŸ—‚ï¸ Provides comprehensive project management, with a universal lockfile. â‡ï¸ Runs scripts, with support for inline dependency metadata. ğŸ Installs and manages Python versions. ğŸ› ï¸ Runs and installs tools published as Python packages. ğŸ”© Includes a pip-compatible interface for a performance boost with a familiar CLI. ğŸ¢ Supports Cargo-style workspaces for scalable projects. ğŸ’¾ Disk-space efficient, with a global cache for dependency deduplication. â¬ Installable without Rust or Python via curl or pip. ğŸ–¥ï¸ Supports macOS, Linux, and Windows. Installation ( Windows ) Install uv with our official standalone installer:
POWERSHELLCollapseCopypowershell -ExecutionPolicy ByPass -c "irm https://astral.sh/uv/install.ps1 | iex"Click to expand and view moreRequest a specific version by including it in the URL:
POWERSHELLCollapseCopypowershell -ExecutionPolicy ByPass -c "irm https://astral.sh/uv/0.9.3/install.ps1 | iex"Click to expand and view moreTipThe installation script may be inspected before use:
POWERSHELLCollapseCopypowershell -c "irm https://astral.sh/uv/install.ps1 | more"Click to expand and view moreInstallation ( Linux Ubuntu ) uv provides a standalone installer to download and install uv:
Use curl to download the script and execute it with sh:
